refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para:
Implements the DC blocking filter
Y[i] = X[i] - X[i-1] + (igain * Y[i-1])
Based on work by Perry Cook.

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: igain -- the gain of the filter, which defaults to 0.99

note.para: The new dcblock2 opcode is an improved method of removing DC from an audio signal.

refsect1.title: Examples
refsect1.para: The result can be viewed in a graphical audio editor program like audacity. audacity is available for Linux, Windows, and the MacOS and may be downloaded from http://audacity.sourceforge.net.

Here is an example of the dcblock opcode. It uses the file dcblock.csd, and beats.wav.
Example of the dcblock opcode.
See the sections Real-time Audio and Command Line Flags for more information on using command line flags.
